What's everybody's favorite difficult scenario to play?

* * *

Also, I am curious as to how many people would be interested in a more
powerfull version of "Boost".  I, for one, find that Superman-like
characters quickly make the game boring, and are only usefull when you
want to compare the strength of one character class against the
strength of another character class.
